data.title: Modular Lighting Instruments: Architectural Lighting
data.meta_description: Modular Lighting Instruments has been making high quality architectural lighting with attitude since 1980. Discover technical ingenuity and beauty.
data.text:
Creating beautifully crafted products that break the boundaries of technical limitations. Our ambition since the start. Over the years, we have built the reputation of being innovators and pioneers in the architectural lighting world.

Personalised Project Consultations

Renovations and newly constructed residential buildings, as well as small and large hospitality, office, and retail projects, each present its own challenges. A Personalised Project Consultation provides an opportunity to delve into the specific requirements of your project, enabling us to identify tailored services and lighting solutions to meet your precise needs.

Request a Project Consultation

Let our beauties speak for themselves

We are proud of our luminaires. We work hard to make them perfect, down to the last detail. Seeing is believing, so we understand how important it is to show products in discussions with your client, when key decisions need to be taken. Thatâ€™s why interior professionals have the opportunity to see our products in real life, in one of our showrooms. Click below to discover the one closest to you.

Discover our showrooms

As an interior professional, you are unique. Your ideas, your passions. When a new project comes along and demands its own special lighting design, your mind works in its own way. Our team of lighting and interior design experts are here to support you and make your exceptional vision come to life.

Our designs are known to contain an element of surprise and unconditional perfection. An enigmatic rotation mechanism, an unexpected light beam, a question: how does it work? Discover our product stories and get ready for the extraordinary.

The Chosen Ones

Immerse yourself in our new catalogue made especially for you. Do it slowly, as you travel through. Let yourself be inspired by extraordinary Modular Lighting Instruments designs. Look at the attention to detail, surprising light effects, the unusual style. Visualize each one as a functional and sophisticated luminaire that will communicate an original, elegant expression to your architectural lighting projects.

Browse catalogue

Modularity means we look for durability in our choice of materials. We leave minimal waste behind during the manufacturing process, and aim to turn the end of a product's life into something new.

We are committed to creating a positive environmental impact and a lasting green social conduct. Under the guidance of the United Nations's Sustainable Development Goals, we have set ourselves some objectives to fight climate change, support circularity, ensure the health and well-being of people, offer a great place to work and create a safe and secure environment.

Join us!

Come be a part of our fun, dynamic and innovative teams. Visit our career page to learn more about our exciting new opportunities. We can't wait to get to know you!

Discover our vacancies
